// This file is auto-generated. Do not edit manually.
// Structure: Array
#pragma once
#include <string>
#include <array>
#include <cstdint>

class my_data
{
    static constexpr std::array<std::string&, 3> entries = {
        "a", "item", "aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa"
    };

public:
    static bool contains(const std::string& value)
    {
        if (const size_t len = value.length(); len < 1u || len > 255u)
            return false;

        for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
        {
            if (value == entries[i])
               return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    static constexpr unsigned int item_count = 3;
    static constexpr int min_length = 1;
    static constexpr int max_length = 255;
};
